comments.html:
In a single routing domain you'd still need one label for every next hop on every switch in the network... and if you get beyond a few thousand devices then the SR fans will quickly point out you can use a controller that pushes label stacks into ingress nodes (or a gazillion other combinations of slightly-misused protocols).

However, if you have a problem of that size, you might get better results by involving someone who did it before as opposed to collecting random tidbits from blogs and videos :D
